channel.title: Readxl on R-mageddon
channel.description: Recent content in Readxl on R-mageddon

item.title: UK Population Pyramid
item.description: On my journey to creating my animated Premier League table in my previous post, I noticed a lot of examples for creating gifs using the magick package. The gist behind the majority of these examples was to create a sequence of snapshots which could be combined together to create animations. Whilst not quite as seamless as gganimate, it appears to be much more versatile. So I thought I would try and make one.
